articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Astrohaus launches a mechanical keyboard for writers - TechCrunch
articles.description: Astrohaus has cornered a very specific niche. The Michigan-based startup builds hardware for writers looking to eliminate distractions. It’s really tough
articles.content: Astrohaus has cornered a very specific niche. The Michigan-based startup builds hardware for writers looking to eliminate distractions. Its really tough finishing up that novel when Instagram exists,… [+1377 chars]
